amendment.description: An amendment to use funds that would otherwise be paid during fiscal year 2007 as direct payments and counter-cyclical payments with regard to cotton and rice production, the Secretary of Agriculture shall make grants to the several States in an amount, for each State, equal to at least 0.75 percent of such funds, to be distributed to active agricultural producers in the State in a manner approved by the Secretary.

action.text: Mr. Bonilla raised a point of order against the Weiner amendment (A032). Mr. Bonilla raised a point of order against the amendment stating that it proposed to change existing law and constitulegislation in an appropriations bill and was in violation of clause 2 of rule 21. The Chair sustained the point of order.
